properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 2 at 2:32PM PST until January 3 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt late Friday afternoon through Friday evening. Seas
building to 13 to 15 feet Friday night through Saturday. For the
Small Craft Advisory, seas 9 to 11 feet tonight through Friday
morning.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 2 PM to 10 PM PST Friday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 2 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY
